item.title: Invalid polygons in mapfile
item.description:
From SakirS...@gmail.com on July 14, 2011 18:24:13
I found invalid polygons in the mapfile. It is possible that those invalid polygons are directly imported form OpenStreetMap.
But i think we should not take them in to the map file.
Or some polygons got invalid during the preprocessing.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=152

item.contents:
From SakirS...@gmail.com on July 18, 2011 06:50:19
Here you can see a list of invalid polygons. http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Fixing_OSMI_self_intersection The two main types are selfintersecting polygons and polygons with a area value of 0.

From jjbross@gmail.com on December 10, 2011 07:15:41
Status: Fixed
